name: Ηλεκτρονικο τσιγαρο
short_description:
HLEKTRONIKO TSIGARO

In modern times, the problems we face are many. The pace of life
is very fast and we run to prevent all and we live in stress which
is responsible for most health problems. Nevertheless, we encumber
themselves to our health, smoking many cigarettes daily. So unfortunately, we are liable for
many diseases that we could have avoided if you do not smoke. But many believe
it's the only thing that relaxes the tension and stress of everyday life and is
can quit smoking. So has discovered a new invention called
hlektroniko tsigaro. It has almost the same format as the standard and are equally enjoyable,
without harming our health.

The positive is that it does not contain carcinogens, toxins, carbon monoxide,
and tar, nicotine only minimal to almost nothing.
